name.ja: TTV アドブロック プラス
name.th: ทีทีวี แอดบล็อค พลัส

short.ar: يساعدك ملحق TTV Adblock Plus على حظر إعلانات Twitch.tv غير المرغوب فيها دون المساس بالجودة.
short.am,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,fi: The TTV Adblock Plus extension helps you block unwanted Twitch.tv ads without compromising quality.
short.bg: Разширението TTV Adblock Plus ви помага да блокирате нежелани реклами на Twitch.tv, без да компрометирате качеството.
short.bn: TTV Adblock Plus এক্সটেনশন আপনাকে গুণমানের সাথে আপস না করে অবাঞ্ছিত Twitch.tv বিজ্ঞাপনগুলিকে ব্লক করতে সহায়তা করে।
short.ca: L'extensió TTV Adblock Plus us ajuda a bloquejar els anuncis de Twitch.tv no desitjats sense comprometre la qualitat.
short.cs: Rozšíření TTV Adblock Plus vám pomůže blokovat nežádoucí reklamy Twitch.tv, aniž by došlo ke snížení kvality.
short.da: TTV Adblock Plus-udvidelsen hjælper dig med at blokere uønskede Twitch.tv-annoncer uden at gå på kompromis med kvaliteten.
short.de: Mit der TTV Adblock Plus-Erweiterung können Sie unerwünschte Twitch.tv-Werbung blockieren, ohne die Qualität zu beeinträchtigen.
short.el: Η επέκταση TTV Adblock Plus σάς βοηθά να αποκλείετε ανεπιθύμητες διαφημίσεις Twitch.tv χωρίς συμβιβασμούς στην ποιότητα.
short.es,es_419: La extensión TTV Adblock Plus te ayuda a bloquear anuncios de Twitch.tv no deseados sin comprometer la calidad.
short.et: Laiendus TTV Adblock Plus aitab teil blokeerida soovimatud Twitch.tv reklaamid ilma kvaliteeti kahjustamata.
short.fa: افزونه TTV Adblock Plus به شما کمک می کند تا تبلیغات ناخواسته Twitch.tv را بدون افت کیفیت مسدود کنید.
short.fil: Tinutulungan ka ng extension ng TTV Adblock Plus na harangan ang mga hindi gustong Twitch.tv ad nang hindi nakompromiso ang kalidad.
short.fr: L'extension TTV Adblock Plus vous aide à bloquer les publicités Twitch.tv indésirables sans compromettre la qualité.
short.gu: TTV એડબ્લોક પ્લસ એક્સ્ટેંશન ગુણવત્તા સાથે સમાધાન કર્યા વિના અનિચ્છનીય Twitch.tv જાહેરાતોને અવરોધિત કરવામાં મદદ કરે છે.
short.he: תוסף TTV Adblock Plus עוזר לך לחסום מודעות Twitch.tv לא רצויות מבלי לפגוע באיכות.
short.hi: टीटीवी एडब्लॉक प्लस एक्सटेंशन आपको गुणवत्ता से समझौता किए बिना अवांछित Twitch.tv विज्ञापनों को ब्लॉक करने में मदद करता है।
short.hr: Proširenje TTV Adblock Plus pomaže vam blokirati neželjene Twitch.tv oglase bez ugrožavanja kvalitete.
short.hu: A TTV Adblock Plus bővítmény segít blokkolni a nem kívánt Twitch.tv hirdetéseket a minőség veszélyeztetése nélkül.
short.id: Ekstensi TTV Adblock Plus membantu Anda memblokir iklan Twitch.tv yang tidak diinginkan tanpa mengurangi kualitas.
short.it: L'estensione TTV Adblock Plus ti aiuta a bloccare gli annunci Twitch.tv indesiderati senza compromettere la qualità.
short.ja: TTV Adblock Plus 拡張機能を使用すると、品質を損なうことなく、不要な Twitch.tv 広告をブロックできます。
short.kn: TTV Adblock Plus ವಿಸ್ತರಣೆಯು ಗುಣಮಟ್ಟವನ್ನು ರಾಜಿ ಮಾಡಿಕೊಳ್ಳದೆ ಅನಗತ್ಯ Twitch.tv ಜಾಹೀರಾತುಗಳನ್ನು ನಿರ್ಬಂಧಿಸಲು ನಿಮಗೆ ಸಹಾಯ ಮಾಡುತ್ತದೆ.
short.ko: TTV Adblock Plus 확장 프로그램을 사용하면 품질 저하 없이 원치 않는 Twitch.tv 광고를 차단할 수 있습니다.
short.lt: TTV Adblock Plus plėtinys padeda blokuoti nepageidaujamus Twitch.tv skelbimus nepakenkiant kokybei.
short.lv: TTV Adblock Plus paplašinājums palīdz bloķēt nevēlamas Twitch.tv reklāmas, nemazinot kvalitāti.
short.ml: ആവശ്യമില്ലാത്ത Twitch.tv പരസ്യങ്ങൾ ഗുണനിലവാരത്തിൽ വിട്ടുവീഴ്ച ചെയ്യാതെ തടയാൻ TTV Adblock Plus വിപുലീകരണം നിങ്ങളെ സഹായിക്കുന്നു.
short.mr: TTV Adblock Plus विस्तार तुम्हाला गुणवत्तेशी तडजोड न करता अवांछित Twitch.tv जाहिराती ब्लॉक करण्यात मदत करतो.
short.ms: Sambungan TTV Adblock Plus membantu anda menyekat iklan Twitch.tv yang tidak diingini tanpa menjejaskan kualiti.
short.nl: Met de TTV Adblock Plus-extensie kunt u ongewenste Twitch.tv-advertenties blokkeren zonder dat dit ten koste gaat van de kwaliteit.
short.no: TTV Adblock Plus-utvidelsen hjelper deg med å blokkere uønskede Twitch.tv-annonser uten å gå på kompromiss med kvaliteten.
short.pl: Rozszerzenie TTV Adblock Plus pomaga blokować niechciane reklamy Twitch.tv bez utraty jakości.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: A extensão TTV Adblock Plus ajuda a bloquear anúncios indesejados do Twitch.tv sem comprometer a qualidade.
short.ro: Extensia TTV Adblock Plus vă ajută să blocați reclamele Twitch.tv nedorite fără a compromite calitatea.
short.ru: Расширение TTV Adblock Plus помогает блокировать нежелательную рекламу Twitch.tv без ущерба для качества.
short.sk: Rozšírenie TTV Adblock Plus vám pomáha blokovať nežiaduce reklamy Twitch.tv bez zníženia kvality.
short.sl: Razširitev TTV Adblock Plus vam pomaga blokirati neželene oglase Twitch.tv brez ogrožanja kakovosti.
short.sr: ТТВ Адблоцк Плус екстензија помаже вам да блокирате нежељене Твитцх.тв огласе без угрожавања квалитета.
short.sv: TTV Adblock Plus-tillägget hjälper dig att blockera oönskade Twitch.tv-annonser utan att kompromissa med kvaliteten.
short.sw: Kiendelezi cha TTV Adblock Plus hukusaidia kuzuia matangazo yasiyotakikana ya Twitch.tv bila kuathiri ubora.
short.ta: TTV Adblock Plus நீட்டிப்பு, தேவையற்ற Twitch.tv விளம்பரங்களைத் தரத்தில் சமரசம் செய்யாமல் தடுக்க உதவுகிறது.
short.te: TTV Adblock Plus పొడిగింపు నాణ్యతతో రాజీ పడకుండా అవాంఛిత Twitch.tv ప్రకటనలను బ్లాక్ చేయడంలో మీకు సహాయపడుతుంది.
short.th: ส่วนขยาย TTV Adblock Plus ช่วยให้คุณบล็อกโฆษณา Twitch.tv ที่ไม่ต้องการโดยไม่กระทบต่อคุณภาพ
short.tr: TTV Adblock Plus uzantısı, kaliteden ödün vermeden istenmeyen Twitch.tv reklamlarını engellemenize yardımcı olur.
short.uk: Розширення TTV Adblock Plus допомагає блокувати небажану рекламу Twitch.tv без шкоди для якості.
short.vi: Tiện ích mở rộng TTV Adblock Plus giúp bạn chặn quảng cáo Twitch.tv không mong muốn mà không ảnh hưởng đến chất lượng.
short.zh_CN: TTV Adblock Plus 扩展程序可帮助您阻止不需要的 Twitch.tv 广告，而不会影响质量。
short.zh_TW: TTV Adblock Plus 擴充功能可協助您封鎖不需要的 Twitch.tv 廣告，而不會影響品質。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
The TTV Adblock Plus extension is a video adblocker. This extension is helpful for blocking commercials. This extension blocks ads without switching to lower quality.

How to use the TTV Adblock Plus extension:

1. Install the extension
2. Pin it in the toolbar
3. Click the extension icon and enable the adblocker with the toggle button.
4. Then, play any video.

Change Log:

Version 1.2.7:
- Design update
- Bug fixes

Version 1.2.6:
- Stream pause issue fixed

Version 1.2.4:
- Ads issue fixed.

Version 1.2.3:
-New contribution option added.

Version 1.2.1:
- Minor bug fixes.
- New UI introduced.
- Added contribution option.

Note: This extension does not collect/share any of your personal information and it is based on the open-source code.

The extension requires such permissions as:

 - "Access to browser tabs" to get details about the website you visit (website url, tab id, parent tab id). It helps us to block ad requests.
long.en,en_AU,fi:
The TTV Adblock Plus extension is a video adblocker. This extension is helpful for blocking commercials. This extension blocks ads without switching to lower quality.

How to use the TTV Adblock Plus extension:

1. Install the extension
2. Pin it in the toolbar
3. Click the extension icon and enable the adblocker with the toggle button.
4. Then, play any video.

Change Log:

Version 1.2.15:
- Eco-friendly mode added
- Bug fixes

Version 1.2.12:
- Stream pause issue fixed

Version 1.2.7:
- Design update
- Bug fixes

Version 1.2.6:
- Stream pause issue fixed

Version 1.2.4:
- Ads issue fixed.

Version 1.2.3:
-New contribution option added.

Version 1.2.1:
- Minor bug fixes.
- New UI introduced.
- Added contribution option.

Note: This extension does not collect/share any of your personal information and it is based on the open-source code.

The extension requires such permissions as:

 - "Access to browser tabs" to get details about the website you visit (website url, tab id, parent tab id). It helps us to block ad requests.

This extension uses affiliate, which may earn us a commission to support development. Users can opt in or out after installation and manage preferences in the extension settings.
